content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "list_files" command and found a file called "legal_research_resources.txt" which may contain helpful information on the legal implications of AI face swap apps.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "interesting_websites.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Interesting websites found on Beebom:
- Deepswap.ai
- Gnoosic
- Nandgame
', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Deepswap.ai"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.deepswap.ai/", "https://blog.deepswap.ai/join-the-ideepswap-channel/", "https://www.deepswap.ai/signin", "https://blog.deepswap.ai/tutorial-guide/", "https://www.deepswap.ai/faceswap", "https://blog.deepswap.ai/", "https://www.deepswap.ai/signup", "https://blog.deepswap.ai/how-to-make-face-switch-in-a-photo/"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.deepswap.ai/", "question": "What services does Deepswap.ai provide?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for Deepswap.ai, an online AI face swap app that allows users to generate faceswap videos, photos, and GIFs. The app also includes features such as a movie role-play video generator, one-second face swap photo editor, and a meme and GIF maker. Deepswap.ai is web-based and data-safe, with no installation, ads, or watermark. The app has over 150 million users and has been positively reviewed by over 5000 users. Deepswap.ai offers a premium version with a 50% discount.

Links: [' (https://www.deepswap.ai/)', 'Face swap (https://www.deepswap.ai/faceswap)', 'Features (https://www.deepswap.ai/ai-video-generator)', 'AI Video Generator (https://www.deepswap.ai/ai-video-generator)', 'AI Photo Generator (https://www.deepswap.ai/ai-photo-generator)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "deepswap_summary.txt", "text": "Deepswap.ai is an online AI face swap app that allows users to generate faceswap videos, photos, and GIFs. The app also includes features such as a movie role-play video generator, one-second face swap photo editor, and a meme and GIF maker. Deepswap.ai is web-based and data-safe, with no installation, ads, or watermark. The app has over 150 million users and has been positively reviewed by over 5000 users. Deepswap.ai offers a premium version with a 50% discount."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'interesting_websites.txt', 'deepswap_summary.txt', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_new_file.txt']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "deepswap_summary.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Legal implications of using AI face swap apps"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://news.bloomberglaw.com/ip-law/ai-celebrity-deepfakes-clash-with-web-of-state-publicity-laws", "https://www.luc.edu/digitalethics/researchinitiatives/essays/archive/2019/theethicsofdigitalface-swapping/", "https://www.intellectualpropertylawblog.com/archives/celebrity-faces-off-against-deep-fake-ai-app-over-right-of-publicity/", "https://epic.org/vox-do-we-really-need-an-app-for-everything/", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deepfake", "https://www.creativindie.com/midjourney-ai-for-book-cover-design-how-is-this-legal/", "https://www.lexology.com/library/detail.aspx?g=b14587ce-7046-4cbf-b2aa-b4d8735ee123", "https://www.internetjustsociety.org/legal-issues-of-deepfakes"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.eff.org/", "question": "What is the Electronic Frontier Foundation's stance on AI face swap apps?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an update on the Electronic Frontier Foundation's recent work and victories in defending digital privacy, free speech, and innovation. There is no information provided on the EFF's stance on AI face swap apps.

Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.eff.org/#main-content)', 'About (https://www.eff.org/about)', 'Contact (https://www.eff.org/about/contact)', 'Press (https://www.eff.org/press/contact)', 'People (https://www.eff.org/about/staff)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://www.eff.org/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2018/06/eff-court-dont-let-right-publicity-eat-internet", "question": "What is the summary of the article 'EFF to Court: Don't Let the Right of Publicity Eat the Internet' on the Electronic Frontier Foundation website?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) is urging a court not to allow the right of publicity to harm the internet. The EFF has filed an amicus brief in a case involving a former college football player who is suing video game company Electronic Arts for using his likeness in a game. The EFF argues that allowing the right of publicity to be used in this way could have a chilling effect on free speech and creativity on the internet.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "legal implications of using AI face swap apps"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://news.bloomberglaw.com/ip-law/ai-celebrity-deepfakes-clash-with-web-of-state-publicity-laws", "https://www.luc.edu/digitalethics/researchinitiatives/essays/archive/2019/theethicsofdigitalface-swapping/", "https://www.intellectualpropertylawblog.com/archives/celebrity-faces-off-against-deep-fake-ai-app-over-right-of-publicity/", "https://epic.org/vox-do-we-really-need-an-app-for-everything/", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deepfake", "https://www.creativindie.com/midjourney-ai-for-book-cover-design-how-is-this-legal/", "https://www.lexology.com/library/detail.aspx?g=b14587ce-7046-4cbf-b2aa-b4d8735ee123", "https://www.internetjustsociety.org/legal-issues-of-deepfakes"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.eff.org/", "question": "What recent work and victories has the Electronic Frontier Foundation achieved in defending digital privacy, free speech, and innovation?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) has achieved recent victories in defending digital privacy, free speech, and innovation. These include a federal judge ruling that a warrant is required for cell phone searches at the border, a New Jersey court ruling that police must provide detailed information about facial recognition algorithms used to identify suspects, and advocacy against proposed U.S. Patent Office rules that could protect patent trolls. The EFF also opposes a bill that would require messaging platforms to report users to the DEA.

Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.eff.org/#main-content)', 'About (https://www.eff.org/about)', 'Contact (https://www.eff.org/about/contact)', 'Press (https://www.eff.org/press/contact)', 'People (https://www.eff.org/about/staff)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'interesting_websites.txt', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_new_file.txt']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "interesting_websites.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Interesting websites found on Beebom:
- Deepswap.ai
- Gnoosic
- Nandgame
', type='action_result')]
"""
